lifecycle badge

Source: R/lifecycle.R
lifecycle_badge.Rd

Generate markdown needed for lifecycle badges that help communicate stability of functions in documentation when added in backticks as shown below.

 #' `r lifecycle::badge("experimental")`
 #' `r lifecycle::badge("deprecated")`
 #' `r lifecycle::badge("superseded")`

Usage

lifecycle_badge(stage = "stable")

Arguments

stage

character. 'stable', 'experimental', 'deprecated', or 'superseded'

Value

markdown

See also

Other lifecycle: reexports

Examples

lifecycle_badge()
#> [1] "\\ifelse{html}{\\href{https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#stable}{\\figure{lifecycle-stable.svg}{options: alt='[Stable]'}}}{\\strong{[Stable]}}"

On this page
